title: Different Movements
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon react to superstar Mikaela Shiffrin skiing out in her first race, the Giant Slalom, before talking what the Nets and 76ers should do at the trade deadline.

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Mikaela Shiffrin's Tough Olympic Start, NBA Trade Deadline Preview
